title: Academic Examples
description: Academic Examples is a collection of gameplay examples to be used with the  Learning Game Development with UE4 Instructor's Guide.
longDescription: The Academic Examples demo project is intended to be used in conjunction with the Learning Game Development with UE4 Instructor's Guide available here. This project demonstrates several core elements of game design theory and how to implement them in Unreal Engine 4. It is intended to be a learning resource and is for use in classroom settings as part of the Learning Game Development with UE4 Instructor's Guide.
technicalDetails:
Contains:
  • Meshes
  • Materials
  • Animation
  • Sound Effects
  • Blueprints
This project is compatible with Unreal Engine 4.19 or better. It is intended for use on desktop platforms only. This project requires the Environment Query System to be enabled in your Editor Preferences.
